page.title: 10 Wolverhampton Health Centre
page.content: Wednesfield Health Centre is in Alfred Squire Road.It's quite a big place. Inside there is a dental clinic,an eye clinic,a hearing clinic,a child health clinic,an antenatal clinic and a place where ladies go to practice having babies called childbirth training classes.There are 4 full time doctors,each with a nurse.There is also a team of district nurses working in the practice and in the patients' home as well.The clinic also has a Health Visitor working in preventative medicine and health care.Her main jobs are to involve families in nutrition programmes,and make sure all the health care services are known about and used.Nurses from the clinic come into school and check all the children, keeping an eye on children who are not as healthy as they should be.
